sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.TestScirptGHSS</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TestScirptGHSS</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TestScirptGHSS = Class.create();
TestScirptGHSS.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },


	//This function is for initializing the outbound table when scripted Rest API is called.
    ghssScriptedUpdateOutbound: function(requestBody) {
		gs.info('TestGHSS' + requestBody);
        var curdate = new GlideDateTime();
        var outbound = new GlideRecord('x_hsb11_mss_c_ghss_hsbc_ghss_outbound_table');
		var parsed = new global.JSON.parse(requestBody); // new line
        outbound.initialize();
        outbound.request_type = parsed["request_type"];
        outbound.sn_task = parsed["servicenowid"];
        outbound.state = parsed["ready_ghss"];
        outbound.maker = parsed["maker"];
        outbound.checker = parsed["checker"];
        outbound.reference = parsed["reference"];
        outbound.last_update_date_time = parsed["last_update_date_time"];
        outbound.generate_advice = parsed["generate_advice"];
        outbound.suspense_trade_status = parsed["suspense_trade_status"];
        outbound.remark = parsed["remark"];
        outbound.reason_code = parsed["reason_code"];
        outbound.request_date = curdate;
		outbound.settle_indicator = parsed["settle_indicator"];
		outbound.auto_resume_indicator = parsed["auto_resume_indicator"];
		outbound.cancel_code = parsed["cancellation_reason_code"];
		outbound.cancelled_by_indicator = parsed["cancelled_by_indicator"];
		outbound.collect_charge_indicator = parsed["collect_cancel_charge"];
		outbound.cancel_reference = parsed["cancellation_reference"];
		outbound.response_body = requestBody;//
        outbound.insert();
    },

    type: 'TestScirptGHSS'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>45381533@hsbc.com</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-07-10 13:03:31</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>82773db11b57ca10ff37eb14b24bcbde</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TestScirptGHSS</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">d610d1db1b287d106ed00e1ad34bcbf9</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="">d610d1db1b287d106ed00e1ad34bcbf9</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_82773db11b57ca10ff37eb14b24bcbde</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>45381533@hsbc.com</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-07-10 13:32:15</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
